extendedInfo.description: The best location-based fishing app available with detailed fishing maps, waterway information, weather and valuable tools to record your catches and hot spots. Fishidy Mobile delivers all the proven data you need to catch more fish whether you're a freshwater, saltwater, Great Lakes or fly fisherman. Automatically synced with Fishidy.com online, this app provides detailed fishing maps with data powered by Fishing Hot Spots â a trusted name in the industry for 40 years. Mark, track and view your catches with a personal and secure fishing log that connects directly to your online Fishidy.com profile, and upload fishing photos and realtime GPS coordinates straight to your mobile device. Fishidy Mobile also lets you view proven information on thousands of your favorite waterways from coast-to-coast, including: â¢ Species data â¢ Structures  â¢ Fishing tips â¢ Special features of the waterway (freshwater and saltwater) Access interactive fishing maps filled with valuable data like: â¢ Depth contour lines â¢ Boat ramps â¢ Fishery profiles â¢ Weather information Upgrade to a Premium membership at Fishidy.com for additional features on your Android device including hundreds of thousands of proven, marked fishing spots, bottom structures and exact GPS coordinates to help you get on fishâ¦fast!What's New in this Versionâ¢ New "getting started" tutorial explains app features and benefits â¢ Waterway map enhancements including increased speed and availability â¢ New feature allows anglers to add the date and time of each catch

reviews.title: Good so far
reviews.comment: I plan on using this as a topographical map for a lake I\'m fishing next week.  So far, it looks to fill that purpose nicely.
reviews.author: John Anderson

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: App is great. Very helpful for strategizing for a tournament on a lake youve never been to. Only thing is that a lot of lakes are missing. Would love to see less well known lakes like lake tillery nc added.
reviews.author: Alec Lower

reviews.title: Dont get it...
reviews.comment: I like the contour maps, but dont see how this will help catch more fish..
reviews.author: George Sorrells

reviews.comment: Terrible app. It won\'t let me on the site half of the time!!!!!
reviews.author: frank landry

reviews.title: Good Start
reviews.comment: I like this app.  It is a good start. Here are some short terms things I would like to see:  links/buttons should give visual that they have been clicked. (ie change colors, highlight, animate).  Not sure if it is there but did not see any place to save a lake map for offline mode.  I would like to see canadian lakes added (that is where I need this the most).  Logterm things:  gps waypoints to add your own hotspots,  gps plotter to track where you have been like gps fish finders have.  Keep up the good work. I had to take a star away because it still does not let me login with my motorola xoom. At first it I had no login button and now after latest update I get server error.
reviews.author: Bill Hoffman

reviews.title: Terrible App
reviews.comment: Non functional as a use full fishing tool. Waisted my money with a one month trial purchase. No way to opt out. Can\'t find bodies of water that  are obvious for my state. Just a waste of time.
reviews.author: Charles W Carron Sr

reviews.title: Well worth it
reviews.comment: Love this app
reviews.author: Irrun Jones

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: Takes forever to get to my fishing location. Species are correct. No tips. Basically just taking up space on my phone. My fishing advisor works way better for me.
reviews.author: Ricky Creason

reviews.title: Just bad
reviews.comment: Has no info about lakes in my area
reviews.author: Jason Hopkins

reviews.title: Like it but needs fixing
reviews.comment: The app doesn\'t completely close, stays active
reviews.author: Keith Grant

reviews.title: Not entirely accurate
reviews.comment: In regards to the fish species in my local lakes this app is not at all accurate. I\'m not sure how or where the developer pulls their information. Outside of Seattle Lake Sammamish this app says Gar, channel cats and blue cats when it should say king salmon, coho and steelhead. Some of species were correct. If Gar and; channels were present fish on I would be out there 7- 365
reviews.author: J Salas

reviews.title: Worst app I\'ve ever downloaded
reviews.comment: I just don\'t understand how none of the tournament lakes in my area are on the map. Also don\'t say the app is free until you go to use it, then tell us we have to upgrade. Species were wrong on every local lake. Complete waste of time for real anglers. Pathetic, wish I could rate it 0 stars
reviews.author: Jesse W

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Not totally there yet but so far a very useful tool out on the water.  Bottom contours is a great help for the bigger lakes.  Keep up the great work!
reviews.author: Kurt Langworthy

reviews.title: Worthless
reviews.comment: None of the main lakes i fish are listed while stupid little places are. Also difficult to navigate. River monsters ap is 100% better.
reviews.author: Tom Alloway Jr

reviews.title: No local waters...
reviews.comment: I live in the Suisun Bay / Sacramento Delta region, the largest fishing waterway in Northern California... absolutly no info in this program about this area.
reviews.author: Matthew Henderson

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Species of fish are all wrong. I like the map detail for a phone app.
reviews.author: Lee Whitworth

reviews.title: No contours
reviews.comment: Shouldn\'t a lake bottom app have contours on some tournament trail lakes? C\'mon I gave up trying by the time I\'d covered 1/2 of TX trying to find a SINGLE water contour.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice underwater contours
reviews.comment: Fishidy maps have great underwater details
reviews.author: T. O.

reviews.title: Home page on mobile app
reviews.comment: Would be nice to be able to navigate to home page instead of just being on my waterways when your on your phone. But this site is awesome and i\'ve been telling all my fishing buddies.
reviews.author: Chris Cochrane

reviews.title: Getting There
reviews.comment: App is coming along. Keep up the good work
reviews.author: Chris Elliott
